title: Sausage, squash and kale pasta bake
description: Turning sausages into small meatballs is an easy way to add flavour into this rich and comforting pasta bake.
ingredients: 200g/7oz butternut squash, peeled, seeds removed and cut into 1.25cm/½in cubes
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
2 Italian sausages, skin removed and broken into small pieces
